-e ---

𒋠 SÍK silk 𒋠 šārtu hair < Scher
𒋠 ŠÍG ≈ 𒆥 šig Zeug 𓋳 wool ≈ "garments" 𒋠 ≈ 𒁹𒐺𒋝𒐺 𒋝 SIG <> 𒆥 ≈ 𒁹𒐺𒋙𒋙 SAGA11 sickle

From Proto-Semitic *śaʿr- “hair”.
Compare Ugaritic 𐎌𐎓𐎗𐎚 (šʿrt, “wool”, Classical Syriac ܣܥܪܐ (saʿrā), Arabic شَعْر (šaʿr).

determinatives

SÍG SI+G 𒋠 Ziegen zeugen erzeugnisse

𒀲𒋠𒋠 סוסיא sūsyā’ حُصَان ḥuṣān Ass Horse ⇔ Pegasus

𓂸 𓏏 𓅱 𓏏 𓏥||semen|start > זֶרַע sart > Saat 씨앗 ⇔ 𒋠 šārtu šar 𒊬

𒋠𒇴 adkin "preserved meat" #kirrētu muddulu (ligature)
